title: Doctor's Portal Online Appointment
description2: # Email and password authentication, Google authentication,
description3: # In the home page, There are banner categories of products, advertise and footer
description4: # Logged in buyer can book his/her products and in the dashboard they can buy the products by paying. a buyer can report a product.
description5: # Logged in seller can advertise his/her products in the home page there is button in the dashboard for seller. A seller can add his/her product under the specific category. After adding a product it will automatically redirect to my products page from there a seller can delete his/her adding product.
description6: # An admin can manage all. In admin dashboard an admin can manage all the buyers, all the sellers, and reported items by a buyer and can delete them all. an admin can make a buyer admin.
technology: # React | React Router | Firebase | React firebase hook | Tailwind CSS (daisy ui) | React-hook-form | React-icons | React Query | Axios | React hot toast | NodeJs | ExpressJS | MongoDB | JWT |  Stripe
